description: Best-selling dependability, durability, and waterproof versatility delivered by GORE-TEX PACLITE®. These rain pants are great for hiking through multiple days of wet weather, and are easy to pull on and off thanks to hip-high side zippers.
name: Outdoor Research Foray Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.value: bluesign® approved Gore-Tex with Paclite® Technology 2L, bluesign® approved 100% Polyester 50D Plain Weave
